stories.title: A 3,400-year-old city in Iraq emerges from underwater after an extreme drought
In pictures: Historic flooding in Montana

stories.text: I remember seeing it in “try new features” in YouTube app’s settings (I’m using iOS), but now it has been removed and I can no longer find it anywhere in the settings… picture-in-picture has been out for many years and what’s stopping YouTube from making it available for users?
stories.title: Ask HN: Why picture-in-picture is still not available in YouTube app?

stories.text:
HN has been a very enriching experience for me; I regret not coming across this site earlier. I am thinking of starting a newsletter summarising the different views in the comments on topics that I find interesting and going deeper into the casual mentions of complex ideas in those comments. Is it okay to start such a newsletter or would it be wrongful appropriation?

p.s. the sources will be attributed.
stories.title: Ask HN: Weekly newsletter summarising HN community views
Ask HN: Do you read everything on a landing page?
